TEXT.TITLE: GEMINI TECHNOLOGY INC <GMTIF> YEAR LOSS
TEXT.BODY: Shr loss 74 cts Net loss 4,192,613 Revs 2,928,021 Note: 1986 net includes 3,095,000 dlr write-off tied to discontinuation of emulator board production. Co's 1st fl-yr of operation. Reuter
